item.title: Speedrunning: A Dance of Dependencies and Restrictions
item.description: Thesis What does it mean to complete a "speedrun" of a video game? Abstractly, completing a "speedrun" of a game is to satisfy some predetermined set of dependencies as quickly as possible while adhering to a predetermined set of restrictions. This post will explore the nature of these sets of "dependencies" and "restrictions" that the community establishes for their games. The Definition of Completion can be Subjective Let's take a step back: what does it mean to beat a game?
